subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Fleck, little known until he defeated Ben Hogan in a playoff at Olympic Club in San Francisco, went on to win only two more events on the regular PGA Tour.
snippet: Fleck, little known until he defeated Ben Hogan in a playoff at Olympic Club in San Francisco, went on to win only two more events on the regular PGA Tour.
